live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.

53208.summary: Some customers in the West End area of Vancouver are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53208.title: Sept 7 - Vancouver (West End) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: We continue to await restoration of power in the affected areas. Once power is restored, our services will begin to come online.
Technicians are on stand-by for remaining areas that are still not getting power. We thank you for your patience during this extended outage.
We await restoration of hydro power to our equipment serving the affected areas.
Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.

Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we cannot give an ETA at this time. We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians have identified the source of the issue but are unable to proceed with work due to safety concerns in the area. Work will continue throughout the day.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
